STATION.description: The identifier of the weather station

value_dict.USW00093134: The identifier of the Los Angeles Downtown USC weather station

NAME.description: The name of the weather station

value_dict.LOS ANGELES DOWNTOWN USC, CA US: The name of the Los Angeles Downtown USC weather station

DATE.description: The date of the weather observation

AWND.description: Average daily wind speed (tenths of meters per second)

PGTM.description: Peak gust time (hours and minutes, i.e., HHMM)

WSF2.description: Fastest 2-minute wind speed (tenths of meters per second)

WSF5.description: Fastest 5-minute wind speed (tenths of meters per second)

WT01.description: Indicator for fog, ice fog, or freezing fog (may include heavy fog)

value_dict.1.0: Fog, ice fog, or freezing fog observed

WT02.description: Indicator for heavy fog or heaving freezing fog (not always distinguished from fog)

value_dict.1.0: Heavy fog or heavy freezing fog observed
